pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Wrapper of the 'JavaScript' Library 'agGrid' // Data objects in 'R' can be rendered as 'HTML' tables using the 'JavaScript' library 'ag-grid' (typically via 'R Markdown' or 'Shiny'). The 'ag-grid' library has been included in this 'R' package. The package name 'RagGrid' is an abbreviation of 'R agGrid'.
